description: These healthy pumpkin falafels are baked instead of fried and are packed with flavour, perfect stuffed into a pita with salad.
name: Pumpkin Falafel Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200Â°C. Place the pumpkin in a bowl with a dash of water, cover with clingfilm and microwave on high for 10 minutes until very soft.
Tip the pumpkin, garlic, chickpeas, spices, parsley and breadcrumbs into a food processor and blitz to form a coarse dough.
Roll the dough into balls with your hands place on a lightly greased baking sheet. Bake for 15 minutes until golden.
